bike.description: 600 Series OCLV Carbon, KVF (Kammtail Virtual Foil) tube design, SC Speed Box & DuoTrap compatible, includes SC Draft Box

components.description: Bontrager SC, 600 Series OCLV Carbon, KVF leg design, integrated brake & stem
Shimano Dura-Ace, bar end control, 10 speed
Bontrager Speed Concept Race X Lite, carbon, +/-10mm offset
Bontrager Speed Concept aero bar w/ski bend extension, carbon, direct mount
Bontrager Speed Concept integrated brakes w/Bontrager Race Lite aero levers
